description: I. Letter dated 09/06/2008 from Baroness Ashton of Upholland to Lord Howell of Guildford regarding clause 6 of the EU (Amendment) Bill 2007-08. 2 p. II. Letter dated 10/06/2008 from Lord Howell of Guildford to Baroness Ashton of Upholland in reply to above letter. 1 p.
department: Leader of the House of Lords Cabinet Office
